component.name: getEventDetails
component.description: Get details of event by ID.

component.name: updateEvent
component.description: Updates an existing event by ID.

component.name: createAttendingRSVP
component.description: RSVP a user as attending an event.

component.name: createDeclinedRSVP
component.description: RSVP a user as declining an event.

component.name: createMaybeRSVP
component.description: RSVP a user as maybe for an event.

component.name: updateEventProfilePicture
component.description: Add a profile picture to an event.

component.name: createPostOnEventWall
component.description: Create a post on the event wall.

component.name: createEventInvitation
component.description: Send an invitation to the event to a user.

component.name: updateEventTicketURI
component.description: Add/update the Ticket URI for the event.
